product.title: ASUS ROG Strix G18 Gaming Laptop (2025), NVIDIA RTX 5080 16GB GDDR7, Intel Ultra 9 275HX, 2.5K 240Hz Premium Rog Nebula Display, WiFi 7, 64 GB DDR5 RAM, 4 TB SSD, Windows 11 Pro & Office License
product.categories_flat: Electronics > Computers & Accessories > Computers & Tablets > Laptops > Traditional Laptops
product.description:
Statement: Original Seal is opened for upgrade ONLY. If the computer has modifications, then the manufacturer box is opened for it to be tested and inspected and to install the upgrades to achieve the specifications as advertised.

GENERAL INFORMATION

Brand: ASUS

Model Number: G815LW-G18.U95080

Series: ASUS ROG Strix G18 Gaming Laptop 5080

Color: Eclipse Gray

Operating System: Windows 11 Pro


PROCESSOR

CPU: Intel Ultra 9 275HX

Number of Cores: 24

Number of Threads: 24

Base Frequency: 2.7 GHz

Turbo Frequency: 5.4 GHz

Cache: 36 MB Intel Smart Cache

Total L2 Cache: 40 MB

Intel Deep Learning Boost (Intel DL Boost) on CPU: YES

AI Software Frameworks Supported by CPU: OpenVINO, WindowsML, DirectML, ONNX RT, WebNN

CPU Lithography: TSMC N3B


GRAPHICS

Graphics Type: Dedicated

GPU: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 5080

Graphics RAM: 16 GB GDDR7

Ray Tracing: YES

NVIDIA DLSS: DLSS 4 (Deep Learning Super Sampling), Ray tracing


DISPLAY

Display Size: 18 inch

Resolution: ROG Nebula 2.5K, 2560 x 1600

Refresh Rate: 240 Hz / 3ms, 16:10

Display: G-SYNC (NVIDIA Adaptive Sync)

Display Screen Type: Anti-Glare

Brightness: 500 nits

Color Gamut (Standard RGB): 100 percent


MEMORY & STORAGE

Capacity: Up to 64 GB DDR5

Storage: Up to 4 TB SSD


WIRELESS

Wi-Fi 7, 802.11be

Bluetooth 5.3


FEATURES

Keyboard: RGB Backlit

Customizable Case Lighting: YES

Audio Technology: Hi-Res Audio with Dolby Atmos and Two-Way AI Noise Cancellation

Camera: 1080p

Built-In Microphone: YES


PORTS

1 x Thunderbolt 5 support DisplayPort

1 x USB-C 4

3 x USB-A 3.2

1 x HDMI 2.1

1 x RJ-45 LAN

1 x Combination Audio Jack

1 x Power connector


PHYSICAL SPECIFICATIONS

Length: 15.74 inches

Width: 11.77 inches

Height: 0.93 inches

Weight: 7.54 lbs
feature_bullets: Intel Ultra 9 275HX Processor: Powering the ROG Strix G18 is the Intel Ultra 9 275HX processor, boasting 24 cores (8 Performance + 16 Efficient) and a base clock of 2.7 GHz, boosting up to 5.4 GHz. Designed for the ASUS ROG G18 2025, it delivers unprecedented power for demanding games, content creation, and multitasking, with AI acceleration for faster rendering in creative applications.

Cutting-edge Nvidia Geforce RTX 5080 gaming Laptop GPU: Elevate your gaming experience with the RTX 5080 laptop GPU. Featuring a 16GB DDR7 graphic memory, Advanced Optimus support, and cutting-edge technologies like DLSS and Frame Generation, this powerful GPU delivers stunningly smooth performance and unparalleled frame rates.

Premium Rog Nebula Display: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals for gaming, content creation, and entertainment with the ultra-fast 18" 2.5K 240Hz Nebula Display. Pantone validation guarantees professional-grade color accuracy with 100% DCI-P3 coverage, further enhanced by a new ACR film that boosts contrast and minimizes glare.

State-of-the-art Rog Intelligent Cooling: Maintain peak performance with ROG Intelligent Cooling. Equipped with an end-to-end vapor chamber, Tri-Fan technology, and Conductonaut Extreme liquid metal, this cutting-edge thermal design ensures your system stays cool and quiet, delivering sustained high-frame-rate gameplay.

Windows 11 Pro & Microsoft Office Pro Lifetime Licenseâ€” Experience enhanced productivity and security features with Windows 11 Pro. Get your hands on Microsoft Office pro lifetime license for free, forever, enhancing your office life with greater ease and efficiency! If you find that your Office is not activated when you use it, please contact the store account manager to send a new Office key. Thank you

If you find that your Office is not activated when you use it, please contact the store account manager to send a new Office key. Thank you. State-of-the-art Rog Intelligent Cooling: Maintain peak performance with ROG Intelligent Cooling. Equipped with an end-to-end vapor chamber, Tri-Fan technology, and Conductonaut Extreme liquid metal, this cutting-edge thermal design ensures your system stays cool and quiet, delivering sustained high-frame-rate gameplay. Featuring a 16GB DDR7 graphic memory, Advanced Optimus support, and cutting-edge technologies like DLSS and Frame Generation, this powerful GPU delivers stunningly smooth performance and unparalleled frame rates. Intel Ultra 9 275HX Processor: Powering the ROG Strix G18 is the Intel Ultra 9 275HX processor, boasting 24 cores (8 Performance + 16 Efficient) and a base clock of 2.7 GHz, boosting up to 5.4 GHz. Designed for the ASUS ROG G18 2025, it delivers unprecedented power for demanding games, content creation, and multitasking, with AI acceleration for faster rendering in creative applications.

top_reviews.title: Great product.. a must have
top_reviews.body: The media could not be loaded. This computer is bad ass. I'm sure it'll be able to handle anything I need or want to do with ita... First off.. it arrived 6 days early.. I'm really impressed... Opened up the box and pulled out the beautiful Asus ROG box the computer comes in.. took the computer out and wow is it everything I was hoping for.. I love the RGB glow from the keyboard and underneath the chassis. I installed Doom just to test it out and it performed flawlessly... The 120hz display kicks ass... CPU is untouchable.. 5 star all day... I only have about 3 hours on the computer but it's perfect... Thank you for a great product Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
The media could not be loaded.
This computer is bad ass. I'm sure it'll be able to handle anything I need or want to do with ita... First off.. it arrived 6 days early.. I'm really impressed... Opened up the box and pulled out the beautiful Asus ROG box the computer comes in.. took the computer out and wow is it everything I was hoping for.. I love the RGB glow from the keyboard and underneath the chassis. I installed Doom just to test it out and it performed flawlessly... The 120hz display kicks ass... CPU is untouchable.. 5 star all day... I only have about 3 hours on the computer but it's perfect...
Thank you for a great product
Read more

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020

top_reviews.title: Overall a great laptop with only one very minor issue I've noticed so far.
top_reviews.body: The battery life works great, and while the advanced settings it has taken a little getting used to, as I figure them out they're absolutely wonderful things to have access too. The only tiny thing I've noticed is that the keyboard is a little oversensitive so it double types keys sometimes but it's such a minor issue it doesn't really bother me. Overall a great system, especially for the price paid. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:

top_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
top_reviews.body: A wonderful computer, and a great seller. Seller addressed my concerns in a prompt manner with courtesy and professionalism. 10/10 would purchase from this seller again. Read more
